name: The Saga of the Little Martian
description: What can happen when you don't read the flamethrower instructions.

entities.name: Niels Bohr Base
entities.description: A research base on Mars. Everything is fine. Probably.

entities.name: Greenhouse
entities.description: A small greenhouse with alien plants. Surprisingly alive.

entities.name: Storage
entities.description: A storage room. Contains equipment of various flammability.

entities.name: Locked Chest
entities.description: A heavy metal chest. Locked with the blue key. Do not force open.

entities.name: Little Martian
entities.description: A curious little Martian. Brave. Illiterate.

entities.name: Dr. Iris Chen
entities.description: Astrobiologist. Reads manuals. All of them. Currently growing alien tomatoes and judging everyone else.

entities.name: Green Key
entities.description: Opens the greenhouse. Found in his left pocket.

entities.name: Blue Key
entities.description: Opens the locked chest. Hanging on a nail behind the tomatoes.

entities.name: Flamethrower
entities.description: Model FT-7 Dragon. Manual not included. Use with extreme caution.

entities.name: Coins
entities.description: A currency that can only be used in the vending machine in the Dining Hall. They are not very valuable, but Martian likes to collect them.

entities.name: Alien Tomatoes
entities.description: Iris's pride and joy. Slightly too red. Decay faster in Martian gravity.
